oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Western Dance Parade - 1949-08-20 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: KVOO, Tulsa, OK broadcast of Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band's Western Dance Parade (1949-08-20, part 2), held weekly on Saturday nights at the Casa Loma Terrace with host Johnny Ryan. Featuring vocalist Jimmy Hall.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Leon McAuliffe; Western Swing Band (Leon McAuliffe)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Announcer introduces Johnny Ryan -- Opening statement (Johnny Ryan) -- Theme (Steel Guitar Rag) -- Johnny Ryan introduces Leon McAuliffe -- Panhandle Rag (Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- Johnny Ryan and Leon McAuliffe read requests -- Wedding Bells (Jimmy Hall vocals, Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- Johnny Ryan and Leon McAuliffe read requests -- Room Full Of Roses (Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KVOO (Radio station : Tulsa, Okla.); Western dance parade (Radio program); McAuliffe, Leon, 1917-1988; Western Swing Band (Musical group : Leon McAuliffe); Ryan, Johnny (Announcer); Hall, Jimmy, 1921-
